posts.post_content:
Have some cards available for sale or trade. Looking for EPDGs.....let me know what you have! I'm constantly upgrading my core set, but also trying to resemble some balance....so if you have other interesting items to trade, let me know too.

Otherwise take a look and throw me an offer. Anyone saying I'll take it gets priority over negotiations. PayPal F&F preferred please. Let me know if you need to pay via other methods.

I have these cross-listed on eBay too.

$SOLD Seitz Piedmont SGC 70.
$SOLD Ferguson PSA 6(mc)

Pick a Donohue for me, I'm keeping which ever one doesn't sell

$SOLD Donohue Sovereign SGC 40
$SOLD Donohue SGC 35
If it's still available, I'll take the Seitz card.  I'll send you a PM to work out the details.  :)
